title: BeatCrafter
metaDescription: BeatCrafter lets you easily create a .mcpack file that replaces the music of Minecraft discs with your own songs.
metaKeywords: minecraft, mcpack, music disc, resource pack, custom music, beatcrafter, create minecraft pack
ogTitle: BeatCrafter — Create Music Packs for Minecraft
ogDescription: Replace the music of Minecraft discs with your own songs. Generate your .mcpack in seconds.

description: It generates a .mcpack resource pack that replaces Minecraft music discs with your own songs.
note: Note: Minecraft only supports .ogg audio files. If your songs are .mp3, convert them to .ogg here:
